name: Cubirine
description:
This is my first attempt to  make somewhat finished game in Unity, and its a topdown 3d shooter made out of cubes. Run around, shoot enemies and try not to fall down in a quest of achieving glory (or merely trying to stay alive).  Gain enough score points and arena will change shapes, drop floor beneath you or maybe even summon something very angry and dangerous... You'll find out :)

You win by going through all stages.

You lose if your hp runs out or you fall down.

Game turned out to be pretty hard, so expect to start anew couple of times. If it feels a bit frustrating, I highly encourage you to leave a comment with suggestion, and I'll think of something. Thus, Im leaving this project in prototype state.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Mouse - Aim

Click to shoot

- Original music:
